mapper.select: select id, works_name, default_image, works_renew, works_type from ft_works where works_status = 1 and works_type = #{worksType} and delete_status = 1 order by edit_time desc limit 100

select id, works_name, default_image, works_renew, works_popularity, works_type from ft_works where works_area = 1 and delete_status = 1 and works_type = #{worksType} order by works_popularity desc limit 10
SELECT id, works_name, default_image, works_renew, works_type FROM ft_works where works_status = 1 and delete_status = 1 and works_type = #{worksType} order by works_create_time desc limit 10
select id, works_name, default_image, works_renew, works_type from ft_works where works_status = 1 and works_type = #{worksType} and delete_status = 1 and edit_time >= #{today} limit 10

select * from ft_works w left join (select works_id, works_popularity_thisWeek from ft_popularity where delete_status = #{worksType}) p on w.id = p.works_id where w.works_type = 1 and w.delete_status = 1 order by works_popularity_thisWeek desc limit 10;

select * from ft_works w left join (select works_id, works_popularity_three_days from ft_popularity where delete_status = #{worksType}) p on w.id = p.works_id where w.works_type = 1 and w.delete_status = 1 order by works_popularity_three_days desc limit 10;

select * from ft_works w left join (select works_id, works_popularity_thisMonth from ft_popularity where delete_status = #{worksType}) p on w.id = p.works_id where w.works_type = 1 and w.delete_status = 1 order by works_popularity_thisMonth desc limit 10;

select id, works_name, default_image, creator, works_creator, date_format(works_create_time, '%Y') works_create_time, GET_AREA_NAME(works_area) works_area, works_type, works_score, works_renew, works_popularity, works_describe, works_category, works_status, edit_time from ft_works where id = #{worksId} and delete_status = 1
